item.description:
Hey all! We usually meet up on the 3rd Tuesday of the month, but lately we've been trying some new things to mix it up.

On Sunday July 8th, we'll be getting together for brunch. Come for breakfast, lunch, drinks, or just the conversation!

Tavern in the Square has a great brunch buffet.

Park anywhere in Cambridge/Somerville on Sundays!

Hope you can make it! Feel free to bring friends!

...
The Boston Republican Meetup Group holds social events to give us MA Republicans/Conservatives/Libertarians/etc an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees, men and women of all ages!

First timers are always welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: We will wait outside for a little bit before going in. If you don't see us, call my cell: (617) 784-7764.
item.name: Tax Day Brunch
